edef81f1-c683-4914-8d6e-fd20e7a766ca.description: The Feedback Contributor badge signifies an individual's commitment to supporting the organization's mission and vision through their participation in product development and improvement efforts. It is a recognition of their important contributions and a symbol of the organization's appreciation for their time, effort, and dedication.
edef81f1-c683-4914-8d6e-fd20e7a766ca.name: OpenEDG Feedback Contributor 2023

issuer.summary: issued by Open Education and Development Group (OpenEDG)

badge_template_activities.title: The Feedback Contributor badge is awarded to individuals who have made significant contributions to the development and improvement of OpenEDG's products and services. These contributions may include providing valuable feedback on user experience (UX) design, reporting bugs, participating in surveys, and contributing data that helps the organization better understand its audiences and industry trends.

87ca87b6-96ed-474f-ad7a-4bbfcf0e185f.description: Earners of the CLA – C Certified Associate Programmer badge demonstrate the ability to accomplish coding tasks related to the basics of programming in the C programming language, as well as fundamental programming techniques, customs and vocabulary, including the most common library functions and the usage of the preprocessor.
87ca87b6-96ed-474f-ad7a-4bbfcf0e185f.name: [CLA-11-01] CLA – C Certified Associate Programmer

issuer.summary: issued by Open Education and Development Group (OpenEDG)

alignments.name: CLA: Exam Syllabus
alignments.description: A test candidate should demonstrate sufficient knowledge of the universal concepts of computer programming, developer tools, the syntax and semantics of the C language, data types offered by the C language, and writing programs using standard language infrastructure regardless of the hardware or software platform.

alignments.name: CLA: Testing Policies
alignments.description: OpenEDG C++ Institute Test Candidates can register and take the CLA exam through the Network of Pearson VUE Testing Centers. The exam should be scheduled at least one full business day (24 hours) in advance. More information: www.pearsonvue.com/cppinstitute
